alert.note: Alert for Shiawassee (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 2:54PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Shiawassee County through 345 PM EDT... At 254 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Perry, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Morrice around 305 PM EDT. Bancroft around 315 PM EDT. Durand and Byron around 320 PM EDT. Lennon around 325 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Bennington, Shaftsburg and Vernon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
